about_the_game:
Dive into the immersive soundscape of Lorn's Lure with this captivating original soundtrack composed by Phrakture. This collection features 18 tracks that transport you through the haunting and enigmatic world of the game, blending ethereal soundscapes, melancholic melodies, emotional orchestra and pulsating beats.

Soundtrack Highlights:
  • Epic Atmospheres: Experience the brooding atmospheres and ambient textures that set the tone for the game's mysterious environment.
  • Unique Sound Design: Discover unique soundscapes crafted using a blend of electronic and organic elements, perfectly complementing the game's aesthetic.
Features:
  • High-Quality Audio: Available in WAV as well as MP3 format for an immersive listening experience.
  • Bonus Content: Includes exclusive tracks not featured in the game, providing an extended journey into the world of Lorn's Lure.

Whether you're a fan of the game or simply love exploring new musical landscapes, the Lorn's Lure Original Soundtrack offers a rich auditory experience that stands on its own. Immerse yourself in the music that helped shape the atmospheric journey of Lorn's Lure.

name: Lorn's Lure Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 273 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 738 MB available space

short_description: Original Soundtrack for Lorn's Lure by Phrakture. Contains 14 tracks and 4 bonus tracks. Explore the game's haunting atmosphere through ethereal soundscapes, melancholic melodies, emotional orchestra and pulsating beats.
